channel.title: Nintendo 64 on Kevin Conley's Web Presence
channel.description: Recent content in Nintendo 64 on Kevin Conley's Web Presence

item.title: Goron City Ringtone
item.description: I made a ringtone of the Goron City theme from Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

item.title: How to Access Channel 3 on a Philips 7225 C107 Hotel TV
item.description: I thought about entitling this article “How to Play Nintendo 64 on a Philips 7225 C107 Hotel TV,” but I figured this crazy procedure could be generalized for anyone trying to hook up a peripheral device to this particular type of TV.
